name: Sun Haven Quilt
description: Sun Haven? More like Quilt Haven!

name: Throw Blanket
description: Despite the name, you shouldn't throw blankets.

name: Elios Blanket
description: A blanket bearing the image of Elios, Sun Dragon.

name: Ancient Sun Haven Sword
description:
A chipped sword, bearing the colors of Elios. It's quite old, and seems to be ceremonial rather than for combat use.
It would look good in a museum!

name: Ancient Nel'Varian Sword
description:
A metal blade, clearly Nel'Varian in origin. It's very old, and it looks like it's seen use in combat...
It would look good in a museum!

name: Ancient Withergate Sword
description:
A wicked Demon blade, left to rust and degrade in the dirt. It seems old, and has clearly seen much use in war.
It would look good in a museum!
